X.ii.4.A.6.a
.
Effects of a Reduction or Severance on Chapter 31 Â Benefits
Entitlement to vocational rehabilitation/employment (VR&E) benefits, also referred to as Chapter 31 benefits, may change as the result of a reduction in an SC disability's evaluation or the severance of SC.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A - Rating Decisions for Reduction Due to Improvement
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A
